The world trembled in fear of what your birth promised. Under such inauspicious circumstances, the folk around you were scared of you from the start. Did you reject superstition, vowing to live your own life regardless of omens? When you discovered your psionic potential, did you see it as a confirmation of what people thought? Or was it an opportunity to prove everyone wrong?
name: Calamity
